name: The Cursed Love
description:
This is a simulation game. All your choices will deeply affect the character of the girl.

STORY

He is a doctor ,running a clinic left by his father in Ostan.
One day,a stunned mysterious girl was found on the way to collect the herbs.
It must be fate,handsome doctor and pretty girl's story started.

FEATURES

 More endings.
 More 'Special' experiences.
 All your choices will deeply affect the character of the girl.
